PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04502018-04-20,  PCH,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectLease with 2480511 Ontario Inc., and Andre Schad ** NCC **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to grant three options of five years each, commencing on July 1, 2018, 2023, and 2028 respectively, to renew an existing lease with 2480511 ONTARIO INC., and ANDRE SCHAD to occupy properties located at 521 and 521A Sussex Drive in Ottawa.
AttachmentsAttachment
